title: #034 - The Path to Discovering Yourself & Your Business with Lana Shlafer
itunes:title: #034 - The Path to Discovering Yourself & Your Business with Lana Shlafer
description:
In today's episode, I welcome Lana Shlafer, Mindset and LOA expert featured on NPR and TVOne. Lana helps those who are ready to turn pain to gain, manifest miracles and master their lives. With an all encompassing background as an Investment banker, Certified Yoga Teacher and Personal Training, it is fitting that Lana finds her passion project within Coaching. Lana shares the peaks and troughs on her path to self-discovery, and ultimately, her own business.

3 Key Points

  1. Working for yourself can be freeing and fear-filled at the same time.
  2. The path to discovering yourself and your business is not straight nor is it one size fits all
  3. At the end of the day in business and life, the relationship that matters most is the one you have with yourself. If you can understand you inner-workings, you can build a life you love.
